All Implemented Interfaces:
TranscoderFactory
public class JavaSerializationTranscoderFactory
extends java.lang.Object
implements TranscoderFactory

A TranscoderFactory that creates JavaSerializationTranscoder instances.

Constructor Summary

Method Summary
 SessionTranscoder createSessionTranscoder(org.apache.catalina.Manager manager)
          Create a SessionTranscoder that can be used to deserialize sessions that are still stored in memcached with the old serialization format (the whole session was serialized by the serialization strategy, not only attributes).

          Creates a new SessionAttributesTranscoder with the given manager.
 void setCopyCollectionsForSerialization(boolean copyCollectionsForSerialization)
          If copyCollectionsForSerialization is set to true, an UnsupportedOperationException will be thrown, as java serialization cannot be changed and it does not copy collections for serialization.
 void setCustomConverterClassNames(java.lang.String[] customConverterClassNames)
          Throws an UnsupportedOperationException, as java serialization does not support custom xml format.

Creates a new SessionAttributesTranscoder with the given manager.

Specified by:
createTranscoder in interface TranscoderFactory

createSessionTranscoder

public SessionTranscoder createSessionTranscoder(org.apache.catalina.Manager manager)
Create a SessionTranscoder that can be used to deserialize sessions that are still stored in memcached with the old serialization format (the whole session was serialized by the serialization strategy, not only attributes).

Specified by:
createSessionTranscoder in interface TranscoderFactory
Parameters:
manager - the manager that needs to be set on deserialized sessions.
Returns:
an implementation of SessionTranscoder.

setCopyCollectionsForSerialization

public void setCopyCollectionsForSerialization(boolean copyCollectionsForSerialization)
If copyCollectionsForSerialization is set to true, an UnsupportedOperationException will be thrown, as java serialization cannot be changed and it does not copy collections for serialization.

Specified by:
setCopyCollectionsForSerialization in interface TranscoderFactory
Parameters:
copyCollectionsForSerialization - the copyCollectionsForSerialization value

setCustomConverterClassNames

public void setCustomConverterClassNames(java.lang.String[] customConverterClassNames)
Throws an UnsupportedOperationException, as java serialization does not support custom xml format.

Specified by:
setCustomConverterClassNames in interface TranscoderFactory
Parameters:
customConverterClassNames - a list of class names or null.
